short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WS WhatSender Tool: Send WhatsApp Messages in bulk directly from your PC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to help you send WhatsApp messages directly from your computer without needing to save contacts to your phone. Whether you need to send single messages or bulk messages to multiple recipients, this tool makes the process fast and efficient.

With an easy-to-use interface, WS WhatSender Bulk Message Sender offers the ability to attach files, customize messages with placeholders, and send personalized content to large groups. Perfect for businesses, marketers, or anyone who needs to reach many people at once via WhatsApp Web.

Key Features:

1. Single & Bulk Messaging: Send messages to individual contacts or upload a CSV to send personalized bulk messages.
2. File Attachments: Add images, PDFs, or other files to your messages.
3. Message Customization: Use placeholders to personalize each message for your recipients.
4. WhatsApp Web Integration: Direct integration with WhatsApp Web, allowing you to send messages from your PC with ease.
